00027 #define VERBOSITY 1
00028 #define LOGFILE "/tmp/iipsrv.log"

00030 #define FILENAME_PATTERN "_pyr_"
00031 #define JPEG_QUALITY 75
00032 #define MAX_CVT 5000

00042   static int getVerbosity(){
00043     int loglevel = VERBOSITY;
00044     char *envpara = getenv( "VERBOSITY" );
00045     if( envpara ){
00046       loglevel = atoi( envpara );
00047       // If not a realistic level, set to zero
00048       if( loglevel < 0 ) loglevel = 0;
00049     }
00050     return loglevel;
00051   }

00054   static std::string getLogFile(){
00055     char* envpara = getenv( "LOGFILE" );
00056     if( envpara ) return std::string( envpara );
00057     else return LOGFILE;
00058   }

00061   static float getMaxImageCacheSize(){
00062     float max_image_cache_size = MAX_IMAGE_CACHE_SIZE;
00063     char* envpara = getenv( "MAX_IMAGE_CACHE_SIZE" );
00064     if( envpara ){
00065       max_image_cache_size = atof( envpara );
00066     }
00067     return max_image_cache_size;
00068   }

00071   static std::string getFileNamePattern(){
00072     char* envpara = getenv( "FILENAME_PATTERN" );
00073     std::string filename_pattern;
00074     if( envpara ){
00075       filename_pattern = std::string( envpara );
00076     }
00077     else filename_pattern = FILENAME_PATTERN;

00083   static int getJPEGQuality(){
00084     char* envpara = getenv( "JPEG_QUALITY" );
00085     int jpeg_quality;
00086     if( envpara ){
00087       jpeg_quality = atoi( envpara );
00088       if( jpeg_quality > 100 ) jpeg_quality = 100;
00089       if( jpeg_quality < 1 ) jpeg_quality = 1;
00090     }
00091     else jpeg_quality = JPEG_QUALITY;
00092 
00093     return jpeg_quality;
00094   }

00096 
00097   static int getMaxCVT(){
00098     char* envpara = getenv( "MAX_CVT" );
00099     int max_CVT;
00100     if( envpara ){
00101       max_CVT = atoi( envpara );
00102       if( max_CVT < 64 ) max_CVT = 64;
00103       if( max_CVT == -1 ) max_CVT = -1;
00104     }
00105     else max_CVT = MAX_CVT;
00106
